medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Onset of symptoms occurred 3â€“8 months after exposure. The patient first noticed macroscopic hematuria four months after exposure, followed by paresthesias in both testicles and then hematospermia three months later. Symptoms recurred 2 months after treatment for hematospermia.
medical_history.social_history: The patient was a traveler who had visited Tanzania, Kenya, and Lake Malawi.
